title: LoL won't start on Mac and the application doesn't respond
body: Many people on Mac os have encountered this problem from several months ago and I can't even play league every single time I want to play I have to download the game again and wait for an hour. It's ridiculous how they problem is not resolved.

replies.body: Your connection might be having some problems reaching the patching service, so it's failing to get you up to properly launch or get updated.  As awesome as Macs are, they can still run into issues like this so I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help clear the way.  Let me know if you have any questions, though!
